mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jefferson is upset about a mistaken account of the adoption of the Declaration of Independence that appeared in a book reviewed in the Journal de Paris; offers a detailed version of the events and votes leading up to the signing of the document; signs the unsent letter "An American."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dickinson, John, 1732-1808
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1787 August 29, Paris, [France], to "the Editor of the Journal de Paris," n.p.
